name: Synthraze
description: A retro-futuristic dragon that breathes synthesized flames and creates powerful sound waves. Its body pulses with neon lights that match its musical attacks.

ability.name: Synthwave
ability.description: Sound-based moves gain Fire typing and 50% more power. Fire moves create sound waves that may confuse enemies.

moves.name: Retro Blast
moves.description: Fires synthesized flames with retro sound effects. May confuse.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: Attacks with a shock wave generated by the mouth.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: Attacks with a loud, booming voice that hits all enemies.

moves.name: Beat Drop
moves.description: Creates a powerful bass drop that lowers all enemy stats and may cause confusion.

habitat: Neon-lit cyber cities and retro arcade dimensions
